what is the biggest power of LLMs,
then you will probably say two things.
First, you will say that LLMs have reasoning capability.
Which means that if you provide a question to LLMs,
then LLM understands that question and breaks down how to answer that question.
So basically, the LLM can think.
This is the first core capability of an LLM.
The second one is language generation.
Once an LLM understands how to answer a given question,
then after that, LLM generates an answer for you word by word.
Which means, in a way, we can say that LLMs have the ability to speak.
So in a nutshell, today's LLMs have two core capabilities.

it doesn't have hands and legs.
